short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A keylogger, form data saver, and many more Google Chrome Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extensions saves all websites you search by pressing the keyboard keys, it gives you option to save function or non function keys of keyboard, you can delete the logs by setting date, it can remove words(like jeans, cream shoe, coronavirus)  from web page given by extension creator.
